movie.name: The Lord Of The Rings
movie.desc: The Return of the King is the third and final volume of J. R. R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, following The Fellowship of the Ring and The Two Towers.

movie.name: skull island
movie.desc: The island, like its inhabitants, is wholly fictional. Kong's island home in the Pacific makes its first appearance, along with Kong himself, in the 1933 film King Kong.

movie.name: Pirates Sea
movie.desc: Piracy is an act of robbery or criminal violence by ship or boat-borne attackers upon another ship or a coastal area, typically with the goal of stealing cargo and other valuable items or properties.

movie.name: The Dinosaur
movie.desc: Sand and dust storms (SDS), also known as sirocco, haboob, yellow dust, white storms, and the harmattan, are a natural phenomenon linked with land and water management and climate change.

movie.name: The Hobbit
movie.desc: Piracy is an act of robbery or criminal violence by ship or boat-borne attackers upon another ship or a coastal area, typically with the goal of stealing cargo and other valuable items or properties.

Trending.name: Animal
Trending.desc: A son undergoes a remarkable transformation as the bond with his father begins to fracture, and he becomes consumed by a quest for vengeance.

Trending.name: Fighter
Trending.desc: Top IAF aviators come together in the face of imminent danger, to form Air Dragons. FIGHTER unfolds their camaraderie, brotherhood and battles, internal and external.

Trending.name: 12th fail
Trending.desc: This Hindi-language biographical film features the life of Manoj Kuman Sharma and his journey of overcoming abject poverty to become a respected officer of the Indian Police Service.

Trending.name: Main Atal Hoon
Trending.desc: Follows the extraordinary life and political journey of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee, an iconic figure in Indian politics and delves into the multifaceted persona of Vajpayee Ji

Trending.name: Six Nine Five (695)
Trending.desc: Based on Ram janambhumi Struggle. Historical drama concerning the birth of Rama

Trending.name: Indian Police Force
Trending.desc: Delhi Police Officer Kabir Malik battles an insidious adversary, Zarar, who has chosen the path of terrorism. The show unfolds a thrilling chase, capturing the relentless pursuit of justice and the sacrifices made in the line of duty.

Action.name: The Lion King
Action.desc: The Lion King, also known as sirocco, haboob, yellow dust, white storms, and the harmattan, are a natural phenomenon linked with land and water management and climate change.

Action.name: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
Doctor Strange
Action.desc: In an accident, Stephen Strange, a famous neurosurgeon, loses the ability to use his hands. He goes to visit the mysterious Ancient One to heal himself and becomes a great sorcerer under her tutelage.

Action.name: John Wick
Action.desc: John Wick, a retired hitman, is forced to return to his old ways after a group of Russian gangsters steal his car and kill a puppy gifted to him by his late wife.

Action.name: The Notebook
Action.desc: Noah, a poor man, falls in love with Allie who comes from wealth. They are forced to keep passion for each other aside due to societal pressure and a difference in the social stature of their families

movieList.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movieList.desc: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

movieList.name: The Godfather
movieList.desc: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son, Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

movieList.name: The Dark Knight
movieList.desc: Batman has a new foe, the Joker, who is an accomplished criminal hell-bent on decimating Gotham City. Together with Gordon and Harvey Dent, Batman struggles to thwart the Joker before it is too late.

movieList.name: Pulp Fiction
movieList.desc: In the realm of underworld, a series of incidents intertwines the lives of two Los Angeles mobsters, a gangster's wife, a boxer and two small-time criminals.

Upcoming.name: Deadpool 3
Upcoming.desc: Wolverine is recovering from his injuries when he crosses paths with the loudmouth, Deadpool. They team up to defeat a common enemy.

Upcoming.name: Kalki 2898 AD
Upcoming.desc: Kalki 2898 AD is an upcoming Indian science fiction fantasy film written and directed by Nag Ashwin and produced by C. Aswani Dutt of Vyjayanthi Movies. The film is shot simultaneously in Telugu and Hindi languages.

Upcoming.name: Pushpa 2: The Rule
Upcoming.desc: Pushpa 2: The Rule is an upcoming Indian Telugu-language action drama film written and directed by Sukumar, produced by Mythri Movie Makers in association with Sukumar Writings, it stars Allu Arjun as the titular character alongside Fahadh Faasil and Rashmika Mandanna,

Upcoming.name: Madame Web
Upcoming.desc: Cassandra Webb is a New York City paramedic who starts to show signs of clairvoyance. Forced to confront revelations about her past, she must protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

Upcoming.name: The Fall Guy
Upcoming.desc: After leaving the business one year earlier, battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when the star of a big studio movie suddenly disappears.

Upcoming.name: Spaceman
Upcoming.desc: Jakub Procházka was raised by his grandparents in the Czech countryside after being abandoned as a young boy. He works as a scientist before trying to become the Czech Republic's first astronaut.
